alert.note: Alert for Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Eastern Culberson County; Gaines; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Loving; Lower Brewster County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 2:09AM CST until February 02 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. A light dusting of snow possible with additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, and Lower Brewster County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.
